DOC.brief_summary: To follow the patterns and natural history of Islet Transplant recipients (the ones that were involved in the Modified Edmonton Protocol) using oral glucose to check sugar levels as well as insulin and C-peptide over the course of 5 years
DOC.brief_title: Islet Function and Clinical Analyses of Transplant Recipients
DOC.criteria: Type 1 Diabetes with hypoglycemia unawareness that received a Islet Transplant here at Washington University "control" subjects were matched to the transplant recipients base upon age, height, weight, & race (and could not have diabetes) well controlled Type 1 diabetes transplant failure unable to match potential subject to a recipient
